languages.text: "На планетоиде произошло восстание заключенных. Возглавляет его, как ни печально, сам комендант тюрьмы, благородный Анатагон Кастелья. Он вступил в сговор с отребьем, за которым должен был надзирать, и объявил о независимости Райкади Филии от власти законного губернатора системы!"

"There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"
languages.original_text: "На планетоиде произошло восстание заключенных. Возглавляет его, как ни печально, сам комендант тюрьмы, благородный Анатагон Кастелья. Он вступил в сговор с отребьем, за которым должен был надзирать, и объявил о независимости Райкади Филии от власти законного губернатора системы!"

traits.locale_text: "There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble he was supposed to watch, and has declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the lawful governor of the system!"

"There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble he was supposed to watch, and has declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the lawful governor of the system!"

"There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

"There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

"There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

"There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

languages.text: «Se ha producido un motín en el planetoide, pero, desgraciadamente, es el propio alcaide de la prisión quien lo lidera, el ilustre Anathagon Casteglia. Se ha aliado con la chusma que supuestamente estaba encargada de vigilar, y ha declarado que Rykadi Philia es independiente de la autoridad del gobernador legal del sistema».
languages.original_text: "There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

traits.locale_text: «Se ha producido un motín en el planetoide, pero, desgraciadamente, es el propio alcaide de la prisión quien lo lidera, el ilustre Anathagon Casteglia. Se ha aliado con la chusma que supuestamente estaba encargada de vigilar, y ha declarado que Rykadi Philia es independiente de la autoridad del gobernador legal del sistema».

languages.text: "Es gab einen Gefangenenaufstand auf dem Planetoiden. Leider wird er vom Gefängnisdirektor selbst angeführt, dem ehrenwerten Anathagon Casteglia. Er hat sich mit dem Pack verbündet, das er beaufsichtigen sollte, und hat Rykadi Philia für unabhängig von der Autorität des rechtmäßigen Gouverneurs des Systems erklärt!"
languages.original_text: "There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

traits.locale_text: "Es gab einen Gefangenenaufstand auf dem Planetoiden. Leider wird er vom Gefängnisdirektor selbst angeführt, dem ehrenwerten Anathagon Casteglia. Er hat sich mit dem Pack verbündet, das er beaufsichtigen sollte, und hat Rykadi Philia für unabhängig von der Autorität des rechtmäßigen Gouverneurs des Systems erklärt!"

languages.text: « Le planétoïde est actuellement en proie à une émeute carcérale, qui se trouve malheureusement menée par le directeur du pénitencier en personne, l'honorable Anathagon Casteglia. Il s'est allié à la racaille qu'il était censé surveiller et a déclaré que Rykadi Philia ne respecterait plus l'autorité du gouverneur de ce système ! »
languages.original_text: "There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

traits.locale_text: « Le planétoïde est actuellement en proie à une émeute carcérale, qui se trouve malheureusement menée par le directeur du pénitencier en personne, l'honorable Anathagon Casteglia. Il s'est allié à la racaille qu'il était censé surveiller et a déclaré que Rykadi Philia ne respecterait plus l'autorité du gouverneur de ce système ! »

languages.text: “这颗小行星上的囚犯发生了暴动。令人遗憾的是，这场暴动的领导人正是典狱长本人，尊敬的安纳塔贡·卡斯特格利亚。他和那些本该由他监管的暴徒沆瀣一气，拒绝承认这个星系合法的统治者，宣布莱卡德菲利亚星就此独立。”
languages.original_text: "There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

traits.locale_text: “这颗小行星上的囚犯发生了暴动。令人遗憾的是，这场暴动的领导人正是典狱长本人，尊敬的安纳塔贡·卡斯特格利亚。他和那些本该由他监管的暴徒沆瀣一气，拒绝承认这个星系合法的统治者，宣布莱卡德菲利亚星就此独立。”

languages.text: 「小惑星にある刑務所で暴動が発生しました。残念なことに、暴動の首謀者は所長であるアナサゴン・カスティーリアその人です。彼は自分が監視するはずだった暴徒と手を組み、ライカディ・フィリアをこの星系の合法的な総督の権威から独立させると宣言したのです！」
languages.original_text: "There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

traits.locale_text: 「小惑星にある刑務所で暴動が起きました。残念な事ですが、刑務所長本人、尊敬すべきアナサゴン・カスティーリアが主導しています。所長は自分が監視するはずの暴徒と手を組んで、ライカディ・フィリアを星系で定められた総督の権力から独立させろと言い放ったのです！」
「小惑星にある刑務所で暴動が発生しました。残念なことに、暴動の首謀者は所長であるアナサゴン・カスティーリアその人です。彼は自分が監視するはずだった暴徒と手を組み、ライカディ・フィリアをこの星系の合法的な総督の権威から独立させると宣言したのです！」

languages.text: "Gezegende bir hapishane ayaklanması çıktı. Maalesef başında da bizzat hapishane müdürü, saygıdeğer Anathagon Casteglia var. Gözetimde tutması gereken ayaktakımıyla ittifak kurdu ve Rykadi Philia'nın, sistemin yasal valisinin otoritesinden bağımsız olduğunu ilan etti!"
languages.original_text: "There's been a prison riot on the planetoid. Sadly, it is being led by the prison warden himself, the honourable Anathagon Casteglia. He has allied himself with the rabble that he himself was supposed to watch, and declared Rykadi Philia to be independent of the authority of the system's lawful governor!"

traits.locale_text: "Gezegende bir hapishane ayaklanması çıktı. Maalesef başında da bizzat hapishane müdürü, saygıdeğer Anathagon Casteglia var. Gözetimde tutması gereken ayaktakımıyla ittifak kurdu ve Rykadi Philia'nın, sistemin yasal valisinin otoritesinden bağımsız olduğunu ilan etti!"
